title: [Bug] Nunu 1v5 Quadra Kill with Ult Charged for Half of a Second
body: Nunu had arcane comet if it's a rune bug but I thought this was pretty funny even though it lost us the game.

replies.body: Its a bug when nunu's ult interacts with rammus' taunt with a certain rune
Wait, did he get the penta?
no sadly rammus just flew to base lmao we were all just shocked.
It's a bug when he gets taunted, feared and charmed while ulting. It's been around for a few patches.
